[00:00.00]Sugar - Maroon 5 (魔力红)
[00:02.12]Lyrics by：Mike Posner/Adam Levine/Joshua Coleman/Lukasz Gottwald/Jacob Kasher Hindlin/Henry Walter

[00:08.50]I'm hurting baby I'm broken down
[00:12.51]I need your loving loving I need it now
[00:16.51]When I'm without you I'm something weak
[00:20.50]You got me begging begging I'm on my knees
[00:24.49]I don't wanna be needing your love
[00:26.46]I just wanna be deep in your love
[00:28.50]And it's killing me when you're away
[00:31.46]Ooh baby
[00:32.53]'Cause I really don't care where you are
[00:34.49]I just wanna be there where you are
[00:36.51]And I gotta get one little taste
[00:39.71]Sugar yes please
[00:43.68]Won't you come and put it down on me
[00:47.48]I'm right here 'cause I need
[00:51.47]Little love a little sympathy
[00:55.45]Yeah you show me good loving make it alright
[00:59.98]Need a little sweetness in my life

[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.12]//
[00:04.25]//
[00:06.37]//
[00:08.50]我很受伤 宝贝 我快要崩溃
[00:12.51]我需要你的爱 爱 现在就要
[00:16.51]当我没有你的时候 我很脆弱
[00:20.50]你让我摇尾乞怜 让我双膝着地
[00:24.49]我不想渴求你的爱
[00:26.46]我只想深陷在你的爱里
[00:28.50]当你离开我心也跟着死去
[00:31.46]哦 宝贝
[00:32.53]因为我真的不在乎你身在何处
[00:34.49]我只想在有你的地方
[00:36.51]我只想浅尝一口
[00:39.71]你甜蜜的爱 是的 求你了
[00:43.68]你会不会出现 给我要的爱？
[00:47.48]我就在这 因为我需要
[00:51.47]一点爱还有一点同情
[00:55.45]是的 你给我美好的爱情 让一切美好
[00:59.98]渴求生命中的一点甜蜜
